author: Staff Reporter
text:
A man threw cleaning soap oil on a woman in a village in Kancheepuram district, leaving her with minor injuries. She was rushed to a hospital. The man and the woman were in love. He threw the soap solution on her following an argument.

When the police were tipped off, they nabbed the man and kept him in the police station.

But the woman’s family members did not want to lodge a complaint.
title: Man attacks woman with soap oil
